<script>
    // Configuración Global ChartJS Dark
    Chart.defaults.color = '#64748b';
    Chart.defaults.borderColor = '#334155';
    Chart.defaults.font.family = "'Segoe UI', sans-serif";

    // Variables Globales
    let DB = [];
    let YEARS = []; 
    let marketChartInstance = null;
    let comparatorChartInstance = null;
    let modalChartInstance = null;
    let selectedCompetitors = [];
    let comparatorMode = 'absolute';

    // Utiles
    const fmtNum = (n) => new Intl.NumberFormat('es-ES', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 }).format(n);
    const fmtEur = (n) => new Intl.NumberFormat('es-ES', { style: 'currency', currency: 'EUR', maximumFractionDigits: 0 }).format(n);
    const calcCAGR = (start, end, periods) => (start > 0 && periods > 0) ? ((Math.pow(end / start, 1 / periods) - 1) * 100).toFixed(2) : 0;

    // --- CARGA DE CSV (Detecta formato limpio) ---
    async function loadData() {
        try {
            const response = await fetch('ventas_boe.csv');
            if (!response.ok) throw new Error("CSV no encontrado");
            const text = await response.text();
            
            const lines = text.split('\n').map(l => l.trim()).filter(l => l);
            if(lines.length < 2) return;

            // Headers: NIF;Empresa;Ventas 2020...
            const headers = lines[0].split(';');
            const yearMapping = [];
            
            headers.forEach((h, i) => {
                const match = h.match(/20\d{2}/);
                if (match) yearMapping.push({ index: i, year: parseInt(match[0]) });
            });

            if(yearMapping.length > 0) {
                YEARS = [...new Set(yearMapping.map(y => y.year))].sort((a,b) => a - b);
            } else {
                console.error("No se detectaron años en el CSV");
                return;
            }

            const newDB = [];
            for (let i = 1; i < lines.length; i++) {
                const cols = lines[i].split(';');
                if (cols.length < 2) continue;
                
                const cif = cols[0].trim().toUpperCase();
                const name = cols[1].trim();
                const sales = {};
                
                yearMapping.forEach(ym => {
                    if (cols[ym.index]) {
                        // Limpieza numérica robusta
                        let valStr = cols[ym.index].trim();
                        // 1.000,00 -> 1000.00
                        if(valStr.indexOf(',') > -1 && valStr.indexOf('.') > -1) {
                             valStr = valStr.replace(/\./g, '').replace(',', '.');
                        } else if(valStr.indexOf(',') > -1) {
                             valStr = valStr.replace(',', '.');
                        }
                        sales[ym.year] = parseFloat(valStr) || 0;
                    } else {
                        sales[ym.year] = 0;
                    }
                });

                if (cif && name) newDB.push({ cif, name, sales });
            }
            
            DB = newDB;
            document.getElementById('rows-count').innerText = DB.length;
            
            // Auto-seleccionar Top 2 para comparador
            const top2 = [...DB].sort((a,b) => (b.sales[YEARS[YEARS.length-1]]||0) - (a.sales[YEARS[YEARS.length-1]]||0)).slice(0,2);
            selectedCompetitors = top2.map(c => c.cif);
            
            renderDashboard();
            renderSelectedChips(); // Pre-cargar chips en comparador

        } catch (err) {
            console.error("Error CSV:", err);
        }
    }

    // --- INTERFAZ ---
    function switchTab(tabId) {
        ['dashboard', 'comparator'].forEach(t => {
            document.getElementById('view-' + t).classList.add('hidden');
            const btn = document.getElementById('btn-' + t);
            btn.className = 'tab-inactive px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all flex items-center gap-2 cursor-pointer';
        });
        document.getElementById('view-' + tabId).classList.remove('hidden');
        document.getElementById('btn-' + tabId).className = 'tab-active px-4 py-2 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all flex items-center gap-2 cursor-default';
        
        if(tabId === 'comparator') updateComparatorChart();
    }

    function renderDashboard() {
        if(DB.length === 0) return;
        
        const lastYear = YEARS[YEARS.length - 1];
        const prevYear = YEARS.length > 1 ? YEARS[YEARS.length - 2] : lastYear;

        let totalSalesLast = 0;
        let topGrower = { name: '-', growth: -Infinity };

        DB.forEach(c => {
            const sLast = c.sales[lastYear] || 0;
            const sPrev = c.sales[prevYear] || 0;
            totalSalesLast += sLast;
            const growth = sLast - sPrev;
            if (growth > topGrower.growth) topGrower = { name: c.name, growth: growth };
        });

        document.getElementById('kpi-companies').innerText = DB.length;
        document.getElementById('kpi-sales').innerHTML = fmtNum(totalSalesLast) + ' <span class="text-sm text-slate-500">GWh</span>';
        document.getElementById('kpi-leader').innerText = topGrower.name;
        
        // Tabla
        renderTable(DB);
        // Gráfica
        renderMarketChart();
    }

    function renderTable(data) {
        const lastYear = YEARS[YEARS.length - 1];
        const prevYear = YEARS.length > 1 ? YEARS[YEARS.length - 2] : lastYear;
        const tbody = document.getElementById('companies-table-body');
        tbody.innerHTML = '';
        
        const sorted = [...data].sort((a,b) => (b.sales[lastYear]||0) - (a.sales[lastYear]||0)).slice(0, 100);

        sorted.forEach(c => {
            const sLast = c.sales[lastYear] || 0;
            const sPrev = c.sales[prevYear] || 0;
            const trend = sPrev > 0 ? ((sLast - sPrev)/sPrev * 100).toFixed(1) : 0;
            const trendColor = trend >= 0 ? 'text-emerald-400' : 'text-rose-400';
            const trendIcon = trend >= 0 ? 'fa-caret-up' : 'fa-caret-down';
            
            const row = `
                <tr class="table-row border-b border-slate-800 transition-colors">
                    <td class="py-3 px-4">
                        <div class="font-bold text-white truncate max-w-[280px]" title="${c.name}">${c.name}</div>
                        <div class="text-[10px] text-slate-500 font-mono">${c.cif}</div>
                    </td>
                    <td class="py-3 px-4 text-right font-mono text-slate-300 font-bold">${fmtNum(sLast)}</td>
                    <td class="py-3 px-4 text-center">
                        <span class="text-xs font-bold ${trendColor} bg-slate-950 px-2 py-1 rounded">
                           <i class="fa-solid ${trendIcon} mr-1"></i>${Math.abs(trend)}%
                        </span>
                    </td>
                    <td class="py-3 px-4 text-center">
                        <button onclick="openModal('${c.cif}')" class="text-slate-400 hover:text-blue-400 hover:bg-blue-500/10 p-2 rounded transition">
                            <i class="fa-solid fa-eye"></i>
                        </button>
                    </td>
                </tr>
            `;
            tbody.innerHTML += row;
        });
    }

    function renderMarketChart() {
        const ctx = document.getElementById('marketChart').getContext('2d');
        const totals = YEARS.map(y => DB.reduce((sum, c) => sum + (c.sales[y]||0), 0));

        if(marketChartInstance) marketChartInstance.destroy();

        marketChartInstance = new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'bar',
            data: {
                labels: YEARS,
                datasets: [{
                    label: 'Volumen (GWh)',
                    data: totals,
                    backgroundColor: '#2dd4bf',
                    hoverBackgroundColor: '#14b8a6',
                    borderRadius: 4,
                    barThickness: 40
                }]
            },
            options: {
                responsive: true,
                maintainAspectRatio: false,
                plugins: { legend: { display: false } },
                scales: { 
                    y: { beginAtZero: true, grid: { color: '#1e293b' }, ticks: { color: '#64748b' } }, 
                    x: { grid: { display: false }, ticks: { color: '#94a3b8' } } 
                }
            }
        });
    }

    function filterTable() {
        const term = document.getElementById('search-input').value.toLowerCase();
        const filtered = DB.filter(c => c.name.toLowerCase().includes(term) || c.cif.toLowerCase().includes(term));
        renderTable(filtered);
    }

    // --- COMPARADOR ---
    function searchCompetitor() {
        const term = document.getElementById('comp-search').value.toLowerCase();
        const resultsDiv = document.getElementById('comp-results');
        resultsDiv.innerHTML = '';
        
        if(term.length < 2) { resultsDiv.classList.add('hidden'); return; }

        const matches = DB.filter(c => c.name.toLowerCase().includes(term) && !selectedCompetitors.includes(c.cif)).slice(0, 10);
        
        if(matches.length > 0) {
            resultsDiv.classList.remove('hidden');
            matches.forEach(c => {
                const div = document.createElement('div');
                div.className = 'p-2 hover:bg-slate-700 cursor-pointer border-b border-slate-700 text-slate-300';
                div.innerHTML = `<div class="font-bold text-white">${c.name}</div><div class="text-[10px] text-slate-500">${c.cif}</div>`;
                div.onclick = () => addCompetitor(c.cif);
                resultsDiv.appendChild(div);
            });
        } else { resultsDiv.classList.add('hidden'); }
    }

    function addCompetitor(cif) {
        if(selectedCompetitors.length >= 5) { alert("Máximo 5"); return; }
        selectedCompetitors.push(cif);
        document.getElementById('comp-search').value = '';
        document.getElementById('comp-results').classList.add('hidden');
        renderSelectedChips();
        updateComparatorChart();
    }

    function removeCompetitor(cif) {
        selectedCompetitors = selectedCompetitors.filter(c => c !== cif);
        renderSelectedChips();
        updateComparatorChart();
    }

    function renderSelectedChips() {
        const container = document.getElementById('selected-comps');
        container.innerHTML = '';
        const colors = ['#3b82f6', '#ec4899', '#22c55e', '#f97316', '#8b5cf6'];
        
        selectedCompetitors.forEach((cif, idx) => {
            const comp = DB.find(c => c.cif === cif);
            const div = document.createElement('div');
            div.className = 'flex items-center justify-between p-2 bg-slate-950 rounded border border-slate-700 text-xs text-white';
            div.innerHTML = `<div class="flex items-center gap-2 overflow-hidden"><div class="w-2 h-2 rounded-full flex-shrink-0" style="background:${colors[idx]}"></div><span class="truncate">${comp.name}</span></div><button onclick="removeCompetitor('${cif}')" class="text-slate-500 hover:text-rose-500"><i class="fa-solid fa-times"></i></button>`;
            container.appendChild(div);
        });
    }

    function setChartMode(mode) {
        comparatorMode = mode;
        const btnAbs = document.getElementById('mode-abs');
        const btnIdx = document.getElementById('mode-idx');
        const activeClass = "w-full text-left px-3 py-2 rounded mb-2 text-xs font-medium bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-400 border border-emerald-500/50 transition-all";
        const inactiveClass = "w-full text-left px-3 py-2 rounded mb-2 text-xs font-medium bg-slate-900 text-slate-400 border border-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-800 transition-all";
        
        if(mode === 'absolute') { btnAbs.className = activeClass; btnIdx.className = inactiveClass; }
        else { btnAbs.className = inactiveClass; btnIdx.className = activeClass; }
        updateComparatorChart();
    }

    function updateComparatorChart() {
        const ctx = document.getElementById('comparatorChart').getContext('2d');
        const colors = ['#3b82f6', '#ec4899', '#22c55e', '#f97316', '#8b5cf6'];
        
        const datasets = selectedCompetitors.map((cif, idx) => {
            const comp = DB.find(c => c.cif === cif);
            let data = YEARS.map(y => comp.sales[y] || 0);
            if (comparatorMode === 'indexed') {
                const base = data[0] || 1; 
                data = data.map(v => (v/base)*100);
            }
            return { label: comp.name, data: data, borderColor: colors[idx], backgroundColor: colors[idx], borderWidth: 2, tension: 0.3, pointRadius: 3 };
        });

        if(comparatorChartInstance) comparatorChartInstance.destroy();

        comparatorChartInstance = new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'line',
            data: { labels: YEARS, datasets: datasets },
            options: {
                responsive: true,
                maintainAspectRatio: false,
                interaction: { mode: 'index', intersect: false },
                scales: { y: { beginAtZero: false, grid: { color: '#1e293b' }, ticks: { color: '#64748b' } }, x: { grid: { display: false }, ticks: { color: '#94a3b8' } } },
                plugins: { legend: { display: false } }
            }
        });
    }

    // --- MODAL ---
    function openModal(cif) {
        const comp = DB.find(c => c.cif === cif);
        if(!comp) return;
        const lastY = YEARS[YEARS.length-1];
        const sLast = comp.sales[lastY] || 0;
        const sPrev = comp.sales[YEARS[0]] || 0;
        const growth = sPrev > 0 ? ((sLast - sPrev)/sPrev * 100).toFixed(1) + '%' : '-';
        const cagr = calcCAGR(sPrev, sLast, YEARS.length-1) + '%';
        
        document.getElementById('modal').classList.remove('hidden');
        document.getElementById('modal-cif').innerText = comp.cif;
        document.getElementById('modal-name').innerText = comp.name;
        document.getElementById('modal-sales-24').innerText = fmtNum(sLast);
        document.getElementById('modal-growth').innerText = growth;
        document.getElementById('modal-cagr').innerText = cagr;
        document.getElementById('modal-cost').innerText = fmtEur(sLast * 239000); // Dummy cost calc

        const ctx = document.getElementById('modalChart').getContext('2d');
        if(modalChartInstance) modalChartInstance.destroy();
        modalChartInstance = new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'line',
            data: {
                labels: YEARS,
                datasets: [{ label: 'Ventas', data: YEARS.map(y => comp.sales[y]||0), borderColor: '#2563eb', backgroundColor: 'rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.1)', fill: true }]
            },
            options: { responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true, grid: {color:'#1e293b'} } } }
        });
    }
    
    function closeModal() { document.getElementById('modal').classList.add('hidden'); }

    // Init
    loadData();
</script>
